structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.catch_line: Fees for water well driller certification.

text.section: An applicant for a water well driller certification shall be subject to a fee by the cabinet of twenty-five dollars ($25).
An applicant to take a water well driller's certification examination shall be subject to a fee by the cabinet of forty dollars ($40).

An applicant for a water well driller's certification, upon notification by the cabinet that all requirements have been met for certification, shall be subject to a certification fee by the cabinet of one hundred dollars ($100) for initial certification.
An applicant for a water well driller's certificate renewal shall be subject to a renewal fee by the cabinet of one hundred dollars ($100).

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 471, sec. 7, effective July 13, 1990.
